title.rendered: Ziggy Chen AW 2024 during Paris Fashion Week

content.rendered:
Ziggy Chen Fall-Winter 2024 COLLECTION

DECADENTIMENT

On the occasion of the Paris Fashion Week WF 24 -25, Ziggy Chen presents; DECADENTIMENT.

Ziggy Chen,as usual, plays with words to create a new meaning; Sentiment and Decadence merge to give life to the FW 24 - 25 title.

Decadence is poetic, liberated from negative meaning, connected to an image of nature that appropriates the urban. Visions of green vines climbing up damp bricks, moss, and white walls gradually peeling away after being washed by the autumn rain, silently releasing energy in its corner of the world.

The colour palette of DECADENTIMENT starts here: moss green, intense, lime, grey-blue and red.

The shapes evoke images of pedestrians hurrying along streets of the recent past. Coats fluttering in the wind. A sentimental time capsule takes us back to the atmosphere of the 80s, a pivotal decade for the suggestions of DECADENTIMENT. The silhouettes expertly blend those years, details taken from military uniforms, and ethnic accents from Southeast Asia. Ziggy Chen's savoir-faire incorporates these inspirations-making them his own, and returning them through garments with an impeccable and bold cut, rich in details that are worth discovering.

The DECADENTIMENT materials are the designer's iconic fabrics: wool, cotton and linen. To which are added substantial knit cotton fabrics and rarely seen denim materials. Moreover, the useage of corduroy and velvet adds different levels of depth to the entire collection.

FW 24-25 is an organic evolution of past collections which presents a complete range of garments for both men and women. Integrating refined tailoring techniques and chiselling iconic Ziggy Chen designs, DECADENTIMENT reveals new styles with fresh, contemporary silhouettes.

Runway Looks

Photo: Press Ziggy Chen

More on: @ziggy_chen


By Senior Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad
